```{r setup, message=FALSE, results='hide'}

library(pROC)
registerDoMC(3) 
require(zoo)
```

```{r read data}
filedir <- "../dat"
  
# get all filenames
filenames <- list.files(filedir, full.names = T, pattern="*.csv")

gestures <- ldply(filenames, read.table, sep=',', fill = T, col.names = c('gesture', 'person', 'sample', paste('acc', 1:1000, sep='')))

```

```{r visualize}
matplot(t(gestures[1:10,4:1003]), type='l', col=factor(gestures[1:10,1]))
```

```{r optimize}
gestures <- ddply(gestures[,4:1003],1, fun = function(r) {
  r <- r[!is.na(r),] # remove all NA values
  r <- approx(x = 1:length(r), y = r, xout = seq(1,length(r),0.2), method = 'linear') # interpolate TODO: not working =/
  r <- runmed(r, 11) # filter (runmed(11))
})
```
